reviews.review_msg: memorize the names of the species and know what they are involved in. He is very transparent on what will be included in the exams. The final took an hour and half max which was very kind of the prof. The lab had stations you rotate between then lab work outside of class which are bigger assignments that you submit . lab matters a lot so do well

for labs just be super creative with the projects and how they look and what you include to do good. Exams ask very small things and theres very little content taught in the course. different from other bio courses. gives lots of exam hints. easy class if you memorize small facts and can explain broad concepts. For labs just go all out and be extra

Dr. Punja gave really engaging and approachable lectures. He is friendly and funny, and goes through concepts in a slow and clear (but not boring) way. You can tell he really wants students to get a good idea of the material and gain a broad appreciation for fungi. Exams were memorization-based but pretty reasonable. Great lecturer and fun course.
